holidays.title: National Spouse Day
holidays.description: A chance to celebrate your spouse and show your better half how much you love them.

holidays.title: Australia Day
holidays.description: Read on for a fun history lesson and cool ideas for having a fantastic Australia Day!

holidays.title: Birth Anniversary of National Artist Napoleon Abueva
holidays.description: Today, we honor the life and achievements of celebrated sculptor and national artist Napoleon Abueva.

holidays.title: Dental Drill Appreciation Day
holidays.description: Dental Drill Appreciation Day is the time to increase your knowledge about new state-of-the-art dental drills.

holidays.title: Duarte Day
holidays.description: On Duarte Day, celebrate Duarte’s legacy — leading the Dominican Republic to independence.

holidays.title: Indian Republic Day
holidays.description: India’s Republic Day honors the day India became a newly formed republic.

holidays.title: International Customs Day
holidays.description: If you’re traveling, make sure to thank customs officials this International Customs Day.

holidays.title: International Environmental Education Day
holidays.description: Let’s rethink our actions for mother nature this International Environmental Education Day.

holidays.title: Lotus 1-2-3 Day
holidays.description: Celebrating Lotus 1-2-3 Day is as easy as, well, 1, 2, 3!

holidays.title: National Bible Sunday
holidays.description: Get your bible and hymn books ready to celebrate National Bible Sunday in style!

holidays.title: National Green Juice Day
holidays.description: Green juices consist of pressed vegetables and fruits — making them a healthy alternative to other foods.

holidays.title: Toad Hollow Day of Encouragement
holidays.description: Toad Hollow might be imaginary, but spreading kindness on Toad Hollow Day of Encouragement is not!

holidays.title: World Leprosy Day
holidays.description: Leprosy is a reality and, together, we need to care for the people affected by it.

holidays.title: Angela Davis’s Birthday
holidays.description: This iconic activist and philosopher has built an incredible legacy over the years.

holidays.title: Annie Rose’s Birthday
holidays.description: This YouTube star has amassed an estimated one million subscribers across her channels.

holidays.title: Eddie Van Halen’s Birthday
holidays.description: Learn about this legendary guitarist, from his early days playing in garages to headlining stadium tours.

holidays.title: Ellen DeGeneres’s Birthday
holidays.description: This multi-talented comedian, television host, actress, and producer has been capturing hearts forever.

holidays.title: Gekyume Onfroy’s Birthday
holidays.description: American Rapper XXXTentacion's son Gekyume Onfroy was born seven months after his father died.

holidays.title: Kirk Franklin’s Birthday
holidays.description: We celebrate a man whose work uplifts the entire world with his beautiful music.

holidays.title: Paige Lorenze’s Birthday
holidays.description: Paige Lorenze is much more than meets the eye. Learn more about this Dairy Girl here!

holidays.title: Paul Newman’s Birthday
holidays.description: Paul Newman reinvented the term “Hollywood star,” and his legacy continues to shine.

holidays.title: Sasha Banks’s Birthday
holidays.description: America’s favorite wrestler-turned-actress won the W.W.E. Raw championship four times.

holidays.title: Teddy Ruks’s Birthday
holidays.description: Teddy Ruks is a creative and colorful man whose tattoos are in high demand!

holidays.title: Wayne Gretzky’s Birthday
holidays.description: Gretzky is without a doubt the best offensive player in hockey history.
